attributes.action: Staynor hall is still growing and we need a local shop for amenities.
attributes.background: We have lots of homes in the area and the area is still growing I'm sure many will agree for those who drive or when the car breaks down its a long from certain areas on the estate with children I think a shop would help many and bring more jobs to the area also.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of your local council, not of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
